locations.name: Raj and Sunita's Master Bedroom
locations.description: Master bedroom in a two-story suburban New Jersey house. Queen bed with floral bedspread (Sunita's choice), wooden nightstands on each side with reading lamps, Raj's thick-framed glasses case and weekly pill organizer on his nightstand. A small puja corner with brass Ganesh and Lakshmi statues, incense holder, and marigold garland. Framed photos of grandchildren on dresser. Closet with neatly hung clothes. Ceiling fan, paisley-patterned curtains, beige carpet. Warm, lived-in feel of a long-married couple's bedroom.

framed photos of grandchildren on dresser

locations.name: Backyard Garden and Living Room
locations.description: Combined location showing two connected spaces. GARDEN: Backyard with raised vegetable beds containing tomatoes, cilantro, mint, curry leaves, and chili peppers. Garden hose coiled on wall hook, kneeling pad, sun hat, gardening gloves, small tool caddy with trowel and pruning shears. Buddy's outdoor water bowl near back door. Green lawn, wooden fence, mature trees. LIVING ROOM: Large comfortable brown sofa with throw pillows, TV mounted on wall (often showing cricket), wooden bookshelf with engineering textbooks and Hindi novels, chess set on wooden coffee table, framed family photos and Indian artwork on walls, Buddy's dog bed near sofa.
